Description.Text: The Lunar Patong is the newest designed hotel with comfortably of 114 deluxe, 6 pool access and 5 Lunar suites, restaurant, free form swimming pool and with full range of guest's facilities. Opens in early 2016.
Hotel is located right within Patong's downtown with only 5 minute walking distance to Patong Beach and 15 minutes to Bangla Walking Street, Patong Shopping Center and Patong Hospital.
Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner are available in this property.
This accommodation has a small lobby.
